sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Ebe foto si, Getty Images
Nwa Idriss Deby ga-anọchịte anya ya dịka onyeisiala mba Chad n'oge nta.
Dịka ọ si dị, ndị agha mba Chad ekposala gọọmentị mba ahị ma kwuo na ha ga-eme ntuliaka ọzọ n'ọnwa iri asatọ ọzọ n'abịa.
Ebe foto si,  Idriss Deby
Ugbu a, ehiwela mmachị ngagharị na mba Chad site n'elekere isii nke mgbede ruo elekere ise nke ụtụtụ.
Ndịagha mba Chad kwuru na Onyeisiala mba ahụ bụ  Idriss Deby anwụọla site na apa ọnya o nwetara n'ihu agha, izu ole na ole ọ fọrọ ka e duo ya n'iyi ọrụ dịka onyeisiala agba nke isii ya.
Ndịagha mba ahụ na ndị agha nnupụisi na-achịpụ ya na isiobodo mba ahụ bụ N'Djamena.
Taa ka e liri Pierre Nkurunziza bụbu onyeisiala
Robert Mugabe anwụọla n'afọ 95
E liela Robert Mugabe ebe e liri nna nna ya
O nwere onye Igbo nwere ike ịnọchi anya Abba Kyari?
Nwa amadi ahụ dị afọ iri isi na itoolu (69)  tupu ọ nwụọ.
Onyeisiala Deby bụ onye bu ụzọ na- ngụkọ mpụtara ntuliaka e mere n'abalị iri na otu (11) ọnwa Eprelu, afọ 2021.
Ka ọ dị ugbua, a họpụtala nwa ya bụ , Generalụ Mahamat  Idriss Deby  ka o jidegodu ọkwa onyeisiala dịka a gbachiri agbata mba ahụ na mba ndị ọzọ.

Mana onye nkuzi mahadum bụ Evariste  Ngarlem Toldé gwara BBC na nke a megidere iwu ala ahụ dịka iwu kwuru na ọ bụ onyeisi ụlọomeiwu mba ahụ kwesịrị iweghara ọchịchị  ma hazie ntuliaka nke ọ gaghị eso azọ.
A mụrụ ya ụbọchị  18  nke ọnwa Juun afọ 1952 n'ime obodo Berdoba, dị na mpaghara ugwu Chad.
Deby banyere ọkwa ọchịchị n'afọ 1990 dịka o weghara ọchịchị n'ike n'aka onyeisiala mba ahụ oge ahụ bụ Hissène Habré.
N'afọ 2012, Déby malitere agha megide nrụrụaka a kpọrọ "Operation Cobra,"  nke e jiri nweta ego ruru nde $50 bụ ego e zupuburu ezupu.
Ọ bụ onyeisi African Union bido Déby was born on 18 June 1952,[9] in the village of Berdoba, approximately 190 kilometers from Fada in northern Chad
Akụkọ ka na-abịa.
